Articles.Content:
Hello Hyperdoom, and welcome to the forums!

I just wanted to say that we are glad to have you aboard and hope you enjoy this excellent community.

Happy landings!

Did you already done it into orbit? If not. then me and some people out there can help you.

Oh, how my lack of education! Welcome!
Hi Hyperdoom! Good to see you've already started becoming an active forum-goer. Welcome aboard!
Hello and welcome to the forums, hope you have some fun here!
